[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Require {
            require: Span(
                3,
                1,
            ),
            path: Concat {
                left: MagicConstant(
                    Directory(
                        Span(
                            3,
                            9,
                        ),
                    ),
                ),
                dot: Span(
                    3,
                    17,
                ),
                right: Literal(
                    String(
                        LiteralString {
                            value: "'/foo.php'",
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                19,
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                ),
            },
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                3,
                29,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
